text: “Roam about through the streets of Jerusalem,
and look please, and take note,
and search at its public squares,
if you can find a person \add who\add* does justice,
\add who\add* seeks honesty,
so that I may forgive it.
And though they say, ‘⸤As Yahweh lives⸥,’\f + \fr 5:2 \ft Literally “Life of Yahweh” \f*
⸤therefore⸥\f + \fr 5:2 \ft Literally “to thus” \f* they swear falsely.”
\add O\add* Yahweh, do not your eyes \add look\add* for honesty?
You have struck them, but they felt no pain,
you have destroyed them, they refused to take discipline.
They have hardened their faces more than rock,
they have refused to turn back.
Then I said, “\add They are\add* just simple people,
they are foolish,
for they know not the way of Yahweh,
the law\f + \fr 5:4 \ft Or “ordinance” \f* of their God.
Let me go to the great,
and let me speak with them,
for they know the way of Yahweh,
the law\f + \fr 5:5 \ft Or “ordinance” \f* of their God.”
However, they together have broken \add the\add* yoke,
they have torn to pieces \add the\add* bonds.
Therefore a lion from \add the\add* forest will kill them,
A wolf \add from the\add* desert plains\f + \fr 5:6 \ft Or “Arabah” \f* will devastate them.
A leopard \add is\add* watching their cities,
everyone \add who\add* goes out from there will be torn,
because their transgressions are many,
their apostasies are numerous.
“⸤How⸥\f + \fr 5:7 \ft Literally “Why to this” \f* can I forgive you?
Your children have forsaken me,
and they have sworn by \add those who are\add* not gods.
But I fed them to the full,
and they committed adultery,
and flocked \add to\add* the house of a prostitute.
They were well-fed lusty horses,
they neighed each to the wife of his neighbor.
Because of these \add things\add* shall I not punish?” ⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 5:9 \ft Literally “a declaration of” \f* Yahweh,
“and on a nation who \add is\add* like this, shall I not take revenge?
Go up through her vineyards and destroy,
but you must not make complete destruction.
Remove her branches,
for they \add are\add* not to Yahweh.
For the house of Israel and the house of Judah
have dealt utterly treacherously with me,” ⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 5:11 \ft Literally “a declaration of” \f* Yahweh.
“They have denied Yahweh, and have said,
‘Not he, ⸤for⸥\f + \fr 5:12 \ft Literally “and” \f* evil will not come on us,
we will see neither sword nor famine.
And the prophets are like wind,
and the word \add is\add* not in them.’
Thus it will be done to them.”
⸤Therefore⸥\f + \fr 5:14 \ft Literally “To thus” \f* thus says Yahweh, the God of hosts,
“Because you have spoken this word,
look, I \add am\add* making my words in your mouth like a fire,
and this people wood, and it will devour them.
Look, I \add am\add* about to bring on you a nation from afar,
\add O\add* house of Israel,” ⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 5:15 \ft Literally “a declaration of” \f* Yahweh.
“It \add is\add* an enduring nation, it \add is\add* ⸤an ancient nation⸥.\f + \fr 5:15 \ft Literally “a nation from a long time ago” \f*
A nation whose language you do not know,
and you cannot understand what they speak.
Their quiver \add is\add* like an open tomb,
all of them \add are\add* warriors.
And they will eat your harvest and your food,
they will eat your sons and your daughters,
they will eat your flock and your herd,
they will eat your vine and your fig tree,
they will smash with the sword ⸤your fortified cities⸥,\f + \fr 5:17 \ft Literally “the cities of your fortification” \f*
in which you trust.
“But even in those days,” ⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 5:18 \ft Literally “a declaration of” \f* Yahweh, “I will not make you a complete destruction.

⸤And then⸥,\f + \fr 5:19 \ft Literally “And it will happen” \f* when you \add people\add* say, ‘Why has Yahweh our God done all of these \add things\add* to us?’ Then you will say to them, ‘As you have forsaken me and have served gods of a foreign land in your land, so will you serve strangers in ⸤a land that does not belong to you⸥.’\f + \fr 5:19 \ft Literally “a land not to you” \f*
“Declare this in the house of Jacob,
and proclaim it in Judah, saying,
‘Hear this please, \add O\add* foolish and ⸤senseless⸥\f + \fr 5:21 \ft Literally “without heart” \f* people,
⸤who have eyes⸥\f + \fr 5:21 \ft Literally “eyes for them” \f* but do not see,
⸤who have ears⸥\f + \fr 5:21 \ft Literally “ears for them” \f* but do not hear.’
Do you not revere me?” ⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 5:22 \ft Literally “a declaration of” \f* Yahweh,
“Do you not tremble ⸤before me⸥?\f + \fr 5:22 \ft Literally “from the face of me” \f*
For I have placed \add the\add* sand \add as\add* a boundary for the sea,
⸤as an everlasting limit⸥,\f + \fr 5:22 \ft Literally “a limit of eternity” \f* and it cannot pass over it,
and they rise and fall loudly, but they cannot prevail,
and its waves roar, but they cannot pass over it.
But for this people is a stubborn and rebellious heart,
they have turned aside and have gone \add away\add*.
And they do not say in their hearts,
‘Let us fear please Yahweh our God,
the \add one who\add* gives \add the\add* autumn rain\f + \fr 5:24 \ft Hebrew “early rain” \f* and \add the\add* spring rain\f + \fr 5:24 \ft Hebrew “late rain” \f* in its season,
⸤the set times of the harvest⸥\f + \fr 5:24 \ft Literally “weeks due harvest” \f* he keeps for us.’
Your iniquities have disturbed these,
and your sins have kept away the good from you.
For wicked people are found among my people,
they lie in wait like the hiding of fowlers,
they set up a trap,
they catch humans.
Like a cage full of birds,\f + \fr 5:27 \ft Hebrew “bird” \f*
so their houses \add are\add* full of fraud.
⸤Therefore⸥\f + \fr 5:27 \ft Literally “Unto thus” \f* they have become great,
and they have become rich.
They have grown fat,
they have grown sleek,
also, ⸤their evil deeds have no limit⸥.\f + \fr 5:28 \ft Literally “they cross over evil deeds” \f*
They do not judge \add with\add* justice,
\add the\add* legal cause of \add the\add* orphan,
or allow it to succeed,
and \add the\add* legal case of \add the\add* poor,
they do not defend.
Because of these \add things\add* shall I not punish?” ⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 5:29 \ft Literally “a declaration of” \f* Yahweh,
“and on a nation who \add is\add* like this, shall I not take revenge?
A horrific event and something horrible has happened in the land.
The prophets prophesy ⸤falsely⸥,\f + \fr 5:31 \ft Literally “in the lie” \f*
and the priests rule ⸤by their own authority⸥,\f + \fr 5:31 \ft Literally “by their hands” \f*
and my people love \add it\add*\f + \fr 5:31 \ft Here the direct object is supplied from context in the English translation \f* so much.
But what will you do ⸤when the end comes⸥?\f + \fr 5:31 \ft Literally “to end her” \f*
